body_html: There are 4 GPUs per node, and I tested with 3 nodes, 6 workers(2 workers per node and 2 GPUs per worker). Yes, I trained with inception in sync data parallelism, however, it has the same issue with Resnet or simple Cifar10 model, too. Does it only happen with inception model?
body_text: There are 4 GPUs per node, and I tested with 3 nodes, 6 workers(2 workers per node and 2 GPUs per worker). Yes, I trained with inception in sync data parallelism, however, it has the same issue with Resnet or simple Cifar10 model, too. Does it only happen with inception model?
body: There are 4 GPUs per node, and I tested with 3 nodes, 6 workers(2 workers per node and 2 GPUs per worker). Yes, I trained with inception in sync data parallelism, however, it has the same issue with Resnet or simple Cifar10 model, too. Does it only happen with inception model?
